name: Cranberry Chutney
description: This chunky and bright, cardamom-scented, honey-sweetened chutney is loaded with fresh cranberries, green apple and dried apricots. The best part? It comes together in under a half hour.
keywords: cranberry, orange, orange juice, fall, winter, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 juice orange, pitted and finely chopped (skin and all)

recipeInstructions.text: Place orange juice, cranberries and chopped orange in a saucepan, bring to a boil and cook over medium heat until berries begin to pop.
Add the remaining ingredients and cook about 10 minutes, until thick. Adjust sweetness if desired.
